All Classes

Class
Description
Aesthetics
A class containing constants defined for the color scheme and aesthetic of the program
Answer
Stores one answer to a question
Button
Encapsulation of a JButton that allows for additional features
ChangeUserResponsePacket
Sends a packet from server to client to inform the client the user information has been changed Is used for recognizing type of change in user information
ClientFileWrapper
Class for importing a quiz from a file
CreateUserRequestPacket
CreateUserRequestPacket file for CS 180 Project 5 This packet serves as a bridge for communication between the client side to server communication.
DebugListener
Debug class used for testing.
DeleteQuizRequestPacket
Deletes a quiz and associated graded quizzes, specified by quiz id
DeleteQuizResponsePacket
Gives clients access to id of quiz deleted, along with if a quiz was deleted
DeleteUserRequestPacket
DeleteUserRequestPacket file for CS 180 Project 5 This packet serves as a bridge for communication between the client side to server communication.
DeleteUserResponsePacket
DeleteUserResponsePacket file for CS 180 Project This connects the server with the client and tells the client side that account deletion for the current user has been done successfully and the interface should go back to the login screen.
Dropdown
The dropdown menu for the dropdown question type
FileWrapper
Class that handles all reading and writing to files directly
GapComponent
A component composed of empty space used to better format the panels
GradedQuiz
Graded Quiz that contains the information of a quiz that has been graded
GradedQuizFileManager
Reads and writes files with graded quiz information for initialization and storage
GradedQuizListRequestPacket
Request packet for a list of graded quizzes
GradedQuizListResponsePacket
Gets the requested list of the graded quizzes to be returned to the client
GradedQuizManager
Manager for the Graded Quizzes
GradedQuizRequestPacket
Graded Quiz Request Packet Contains the method that handles a handle request by the server.
GradedQuizResponsePacket
Graded Quiz Response Packet Holds the Graded Quiz packet that is sent as a response
Heading
Encapsulation of JLabel, helps with creating a Heading in the GUI along with setting all the needed aesthetics of it.
Label
Encapsulation of JLabel, helps with creating a label along with setting all the needed aesthetics
LearningManagementSystemClient
Main class that ties all the systems together.
LearningManagementSystemServer
Main class that ties all the systems together.
Listable
An interface used for items that wish to be able to be shown in a OptinListMenu.
ListableGradedQuiz
A wrapper class for Graded Quiz that is used for showing graded quizzes in UI lists.
LoginUserRequestPacket
LoginUserRequestPacket file for CS 180 Project 5 Once the user enters the username and password and clicks on the submit button to log in to the system, The client side connects with the server to send the information, process that information, And authenticates the identity of the user based on their inputs.
Manager
Manager interface for CS 180 Project 4 All managers will come from this The methods of this interface will help users initialize anything before user does anything
NetworkManagerClient
Runs the client for the Learning Management System
NetworkManagerServer
Runs the server for the Learning Management System
NewUserResponsePacket
NewUserResponsePacket file for CS 180 Project Stores the user that has logged in to the program as an object
Panel
The main class for the GUI framework.
PanelRunnable
Helps with calling a callback function for a component in a panel , giving it the panel that it was run in.
PushPacketHandler
Handles the push packets when they are received
Question
Stores one Question, including multiple answers
Quiz
A quiz, which contains an arraylist of questions along with various attributes of the quiz
QuizFileManager
Reads and writes files with quiz information for initialization and storage
QuizListRequestPacket
Request Packet for a list of quizzes Requests the server to send a list of quizzes to the client
QuizListResponsePacket
Gets the requested list of the quizzes to be returned to the client
QuizManager
Stores a list of every created quiz, which is instantiated every time the program is run
QuizRequestPacket
Request Packet for a single quiz Requests the server to send a quiz to the client
QuizResponsePacket
Gets the requested quiz to be returned to the client
RadioButton
Helps with RadioButton creation and contains all the methods related to it.
RequestPacket
Parent class for all RequestPacket types
ResponsePacket
Parent class for all ResponsePacket types Sent from the server to the client to response to the requests it makes.
ResponsePacketHandler
Handles packets received from the server
RunnableHandleResponsePacket
An interface that gives a callback function whenever a packet is received for a specific request
Student
Class that contains the detail of a student
Teacher
Class that contains the detail of a teacher
TextField
Helps with JTextField creation and contains all the methods related to it.
UIManager
The manager that is responsible for the User Interface (UI).
UpdateUserRequestPacket
Sends a packet from client to server so that user information can be updated in real-time on the GUI
User
Super class that contains the details of a particular user
UserFileManager
Reads and writes files with user information for initialization and storage
UserManager
The UserManager of the application
UserPermission
Enum that holds the two possible values of a user's permission: ADMIN and USER
